actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary and Vocational Education.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary, and Vocational Education

official_title: To amend the Child Nutrition Act of 1966 to provide for more competitive pricing of infant formula for the special supplemental food program for women, infants, and children (WIC), and for other purposes.
short_title: WIC Infant Feeding Initiative Act of 1991
subjects: Federal aid to maternal health services

summary.text: WIC Infant Feeding Initiative Act of 1991 - Amends the Child Nutrition Act of 1966 with regard to the procurement of infant formula for the special supplemental food program for women, infants, and children (WIC), to provide for: (1) regional competitive manufacturer bidding, including bids for specific formulas designed to increase the number of manufacturers bidding; and (2) disqualification for up to two years for premature bid disclosure.

titles.title: WIC Infant Feeding Initiative Act of 1991

To amend the Child Nutrition Act of 1966 to provide for more competitive pricing of infant formula for the special supplemental food program for women, infants, and children (WIC), and for other purposes.
